com.github.macgregor.alexandria

Interface Context.ContextAware

  • Enclosing class:
    Context

    public static interface Context.ContextAware
    Interface indicating that a class needs the Alexandria Context. This is mostly an informational class as there is no Dependency Injection framework to automatically add context but Context.configureRemote() will examine the Remote and MarkdownConverter classes to see if they implment this interface, providing the Context to them if it is found.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Context alexandriaContext()
      Return the configured Alexandria Context.
      void alexandriaContext(Context context)
      Provides the Context to the implementing class.

    • Method Detail

      • alexandriaContext

        void alexandriaContext(Context context)
        Provides the Context to the implementing class.
        Parameters:
        context - initialized Alexandria Context

      • alexandriaContext

        Context alexandriaContext()
        Return the configured Alexandria Context. May return null if called before alexandriaContext(Context) has been called.
        Returns:
        Alexandria Context, nullable
